CASCADE_PERMS.CascadeHint: Apply these permissions to all documents in this folder and its sub-folders.
CASCADE_PERMS.CascadeNote: This will overwrite existing permissions on every document in this folder tree.
CASCADE_PERMS.SuccessCascade: Cascade Permissions: Updated {count} document(s) across {folders} sub-folder(s).
CASCADE_PERMS.NoDocuments: Cascade Permissions: No documents found in this folder tree.
CASCADE_PERMS.ErrorCascade: Cascade Permissions: An error occurred. Check the browser console (F12) for details.
